titleStmt.title: The book of the general laws of the inhabitants of the jurisdiction of New-Plimouth collected out of the records of the General Court, and lately revised : and with some emendations and additions established and disposed into such order as they my readily conduce to general use and benefit by the order and authority of the General Court of New-Plimouth held at Plimouth, June 2d. anno Dom. 1685 reprinted and published, Nathaniel Clerk, secrt'.
Laws, etc. (Book of the general laws : 1685)
titleStmt.author: New Plymouth Colony.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
